title: idhiga dhayanandhamu
sahitya:
idiga dayAnandamu brahmAnanda idiga dayAntamu

anupallavi

 padaraka hari payina pATalu pADucu madini 
brahmAnandamanu bhAvincucunuNDu

caraNam 1

 pAtakamula nella pAradOli brOcu sutAramu nisE vincucu 
cEta tambura moka jentALamu bUti pAtaralADucu bhajana sEyucuNuNDu
 
caraNam 2

 sajjanulanu jERi sadbhakti mIrija kajjAlamu hari mayamanucucU 
lajja viDaci pajja nilaci kAla gojjalu gaTTuka ghalu khalalucU
 
caraNam 3

 rAmacandrapura guruvarulanu gUDi rAmadAsa suDanadi ranjillucU 
rAma rAma raghurAma harayE nirAmAmrta pAnamu sEyucuNDu
